name: Super Blorpy Run
description:
This is my entry to the 2nd Vaultacular Game Jam built in RPG In a Box. It's a "runner" game, which is outside of the intended scope of the engine but was fun to make!

Controls: Arrow Keys

Esc: Menu

This game is.. buggy at best.  It crashes frequently (sorry) and even though you can save, it doesn't always work after saving. So, best of luck getting to the end if you can power through it!
